response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. I propose to sell the product to you for $9,500. This price not only ensures a fair profit for me but also represents a significant saving for you compared to its market value. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
